entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
